casebody.data:
Adam T. CHEATHAM, Sr.
v.
TOWN OF TAYLORTOWN No. 388P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Adam T. Cheatham, Sr., for Cheatham, Adam T. (Sr.). William C. Morgan, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Town of Taylortown.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 2nd of November 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
